==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = Slash
|desc_1      = Slashes twice with his claymore, dealing '''90% ATK''', '''90% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_2      = Cleave
|desc_2      = Stabs forward with the butt of his claymore and cleaves down, dealing '''60% ATK''', '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_3      = Boomerang
|desc_3      = Throws his claymore, which rapidly spins and flies in a straight line on the first throw, then in an arc before returning to him, dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Dendro DMG}} in its path. If the claymore hits an object while in flight, it will ricochet and knock the Swiftstep Armed Courier back. Applying {{Dendro}} to him.
}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A warrior from the Canopy, and a tribal guardian that patrols the forest valleys and mountain streams.<br>Many wonder if claymores are too heavy to be wielded by the couriers of the Scions of the Canopy, but perhaps it is precisely because their duties are heavier still that a weapon more capable of deterrence is a necessity.|[[Archive]]}}
